title: ISic000120. I.Sicily inscription 000120
body:
1D(is) ❦ m(anibus)
2Acilia ❦ M(arci) f(ilia) Cris-
3pina ❦ v(ixit) ❦ a(nnis) ❦ II ❦
4m(ensibus) ❦ VII ❦ d(iebus) XV

1D❦M
2ACILIA❦MFCRIS
3PINA❦V❦A❦II❦
4M❦VII❦DXV

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Gualtherus

Latin translation

Tuuli Ahlholm

To the Shades of the underworld. Acilia Crispina, daughter of Marcus, lived two years, seven months and fifteen days.

commentary
